Articles.Content:
sadly the smoke and flame effects for LFO engines are lackluster- i will stay with my HotRockets for the time being if i could.

the new aero might put a hinge in my current project since i will need to control a falcon 9 on the way down and predict how the hell it will land on a predictable place (or i could cheese it)
Ooh there are procedural fairings. I thought people were saying that wasn't in 1.0?
Man, we are on the verge of 1.0 being released, and there still isn't an official Ravenspear Mk2 plane!

I'm currently watching the KSPTV livestream testing various 1.0 stuff, and so far I can tell the ones unable to watch:

- Valentina is even more awesome than advertised

- Reentry heat is somewhat accumulative. It seems to propagate through the ship, and takes a bit to cool down (More realistic than deadly reentry in that respect)

- SMOKE EFFECTS ARE AMAZING! When launching, the engine exhaust comes out of the side of the pad. And if hovering over ground, smoke will flow outwards over ground.

- Tech tree now allows you to see far ahead what parts are where, so it's easier to plan. Also, it seems to branch more
Any word on save file compatibility.
Going off of EEs vid, destructible buildings are still rather sensitive, heh
no barn!!!
